DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all authentication context information in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read all authentication context information in your organization on your behalf.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the authentication context information in your organization without a signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write all authentication context information
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update all authentication context information in your organization on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write all authentication context information
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read and update all authentication context information in your organization on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all authentication context information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update the authentication context information in your organization without a signed-in user.
